This page is to showcase the site Faqs

This page showcases the site faqs. Faq content is defined in a collection faqs, with each collection item being a question and its corresponding answer in its content. Icons are set up using a chevron down rotated at 90 degrees in the collapsed state and being rotated another 90 degrees when the faq is opened.
What is Dog?

Dog is a mammal.

What is my name?

My name is Jeff.

What is Water?

Water is wet.

What is Yellow?

Yellow is a colour.
